price: او چا چې ځان وکړاوه نو بې شکه کړاو یې له ځان لپاره دی، بې شکه الله تعالی له مخلوقاتو څخه بې پروا دی.
arabic: وَمَن جَٰهَدَ فَإِنَّمَا يُجَٰهِدُ لِنَفۡسِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَغَنِيٌّ عَنِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: waman jāhada fa-innamā yujāhidu linafsihi inna al-laha laghaniyyun ʿani al-ʿālamīna
